alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 3:01AM MST until January 21 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Post Falls, Fairfield, Othello, Ephrata, Harrington, Creston, Grand Coulee, Cheney, Quincy, Davenport, Coulee City, Rosalia, Rockford, Odessa, Coeur d`Alene, Airway Heights, Ritzville, Hayden, Moses Lake, and Wilbur. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions especially on untreated roads. Driveways, parking lots, and sidewalks may be especially slick this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bands of freezing rain this morning will contribute to already slick conditions around Spokane, Ritzville, Moses Lake, Othello, Wilbur, and Davenport.
info.instruction: Be prepared for ice on untreated roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
